DOC.brief_title: Atopy Patch Test Normal Population : Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: The initial diagnostic work suspect food allergy include patient 's history , skin prick test ( SPT ) , measurement food specific immunoglobulin E ( IgE ) serological assay , recently atopy patch test . A positive SPT seem reflect early reaction food challenge , whereas atopy patch test high diagnostic efficacy late phase clinical reaction . The purpose study evaluate atopy patch test reaction non-atopic population .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Age 1840 yr Volunteer sign inform consent dermographism chronic disease eg.autoimmune disease , immune deficiency , cancer allergic disease pregnant woman severe eczema receive antihistamine , topical steroid systemic steroid > 20 mg/day within 7 day prior study
